name: Google Compact for GoogleMonkeyR
description: This UserStyle is intended to be used in connection with GoogleMonkeyR. It is based on style 17183 â€“ which I used before switching to GoogleMonkeyR, but found it collides with it in some aspects. So I removed the duplicate elements (like MultiColumn), and made the result a separate UserStyle.
additional_info:
What this UserStyle does is:
  • Using a smaller and clearer font
  • Removing some ads and unnecessary spaces
  • Simplifying the "pager" (at the end of the result list)
  • In summary: Making the result pages fitting on screen without scrolling (at least in most cases)
History

On Linux, it seems the Monkey (accidentally, v1.7.0) hides the search input. We override that now to make it visible again.
